channel.title: Help me plzzz! (Higher leveled Coder Please)

item.title: Help me plzzz! (Higher leveled Coder Please)
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

ok i have been Coding for a while and i have this one problem and i cannot figure it out theres and object i click on and its suppose to do some thing but it acts like i click on some thing else ill post the codes here and except any help that comes my way

this is the clicked object


             if (objectX == 2785 && objectY == 9142) {
                    sendMessage("Kill this guy and then continue your quest");
                    teleportToX = 2834;
                    teleportToY = 9768;
                    addItem(385, 1);
                    addItem(385, 1);
                    addItem(385, 1);
                    addItem(385, 1);
                    addItem(385, 1);
                }

this is the one that rakes action


             if (playerHasItemAmount(746, 1)==false) {
	      sendMessage("You Noob I told you needed the daggar");
                    teleportToX = 2767;
                    teleportToY = 9103;
                    addItem(3460, 1);
	      } else if(playerHasItemAmount(746, 1)==true) {
         sendMessage("You are home.");
                teleportToX = 3409;
                teleportToY = 3489;
             }

thanks in advance

Read full topic
item.source: Help me plzzz! (Higher leveled Coder Please)
